name: Bouncy Need Grass (Pali_Panther)
description:
*BEFORE YOU PLAY*

This is the first game I made. It's about a sheep who is dumb because when it snowed he thought it was something else so he goes on an adventure for grass to eat.

I wanted to upload the game to itch for laughs. So it would be bad but I mean every first game is lol.

*CONTROLS: A = MOVE LEFT, D = MOVE RIGHT, SPACEBAR = JUMP, LEFT MOUSE = SHOOT*
